name: Advisor of the Sand
effect:
Sand | Advisor | Male | Mental Power: 3 | SURGE
[FOR THE VILLAGE]
When 1 of your Ninjas is Surged, draw 1 card.
Valid: Your "Sand" and "Leaf" Ninjas get +1 Entrance cost.

name: Animal Contract
effect:
Permanent (4)
Effect: When this Mission card is put in play, select 1 of the following: Ninja Toad, Ninja Dog, Tailed Beast Form, or Snake
Effect: When a Ninja with the selected Characteristic is put in play, draw 1 card. This effect cannot be duplicated.
"It's a teleportation technique in which you sign a contract in blood with all kinds of living creatures and then summon them whenever you like with Ninjutsu, Ninja Art."

name: Anko Mitarashi
effect:
Leaf | Special Jonin | Female | Mental Power: 1
[SHARED SPOILS]
During the Mission Phase, you can discard this Ninja. In that case, if your opponent would draw cards due to an effect during this turn, you draw the same number of cards.

name: Anko Mitarashi (Childhood)
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 1 | Name: Anko Mitarashi | GROWTH
[SERPENT'S STUDENT]
Valid: When this Ninja is discarded due to the Showdown, move this Ninja to its owner's Chakra area instead. In that case, you can move 1 card from your Discard Pile to your Chakra area.
"You can't bring back the dead, can you?"

name: Asuma Sarutobi
effect:
Leaf | Jonin | Male | 12 Shinobi Guardians | MASTERY
[THE WILL OF FIRE]
During the Exchange of Jutsu, you can turn 3 of your opponent's Battle Rewards face down. In that case, make 1 Battling Ninja a Stand-By Ninja.
Cards in your hand and Chakra area cannot be affected by your opponent's effects.
"My Will of Fire…is now yours."

name: Awakening the Byakugan
effect:
Requirements: "Byakugan"
Effect: The user's Team gets +2 Team Power and +2 Team Mental Power during this turn. If the user's Team wins any Victory or Battle Reward, your opponent randomly discards 1 card in their hand.
"Behind us!"

name: Backed Into a Corner
effect:
Target: 1 of your opponent's Tracked Ninja
Effect: Your opponent moves all their Ninjas into the target's Team, in any position.
"It you're not going to do anything, you're in the way, so beat it!"

name: Battle over the Barrier
effect: Effect: At the start of the Battle Phase of this turn, each player selects up to 3 of their "Female" and/or "Medical" Ninjas and remove them from their Teams. Those Ninjas must be sent out to Battle ignoring all other effects during this turn. Other Ninjas cannot be sent out to Battle during this turn. During the Showdown of this turn, if a player wins any Victory, that player wins 1 Battle Reward and draws 1 card.
"Four-Corner Sealing Barrier…Lock!"

name: Big Bark Bull
effect:
Leaf | Animal | Ninja Dog
[BIG BARK TRACKER]
Tracking (When this Ninja is put in play. Select a Ninja name.Your opponent's Ninjas that include that name are considered Tracked. Only 1 Ninja name per player can be Tracked at a time.)
When your opponent's Tracked Ninja is sent out to attack, you can put a "Ninja Dog" Ninja card from your hand or Chakra area into this Ninja's Team in any position.

name: Biscuit
effect:
Leaf | Mental Power: 1 | Animal | Ninja Dog
[RELIABLE TRACKER]
Tracking

Target: 1 Ninja

effect:
Sand | Female | Mental Power: 3 | Medical | Puppet Master | MASTERY | SURGE

Leaf | Genin | Male | Secret Pills | GROWTH

effect:
Permanent (2)

name: Puppet Fight: 10 vs. 100!
effect: Effect: Each player reveals up to 10 cards from the top of their Deck and puts any number of Ninja cards from among the revealed cards and from their hand in play. Effect text of Ninjas put in play due to this effect are negated. In that case, your opponent can organize their Teams. Then each player returns the rest of the revealed cards to their Deck and shuffles it.
"However…I…used this to bring down a nation!"

name: Puppet Master Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: Entrance cost of 4 or more
Target:1 Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Move the user and the target to their owner's hand. If the user is a "Surge" Ninja, draw 1 card.
"His fingers always move before he attacks…"

name: Quick Reflex
effect:
Requirements: "Animal"
Target: 1 Ninja in the user's Team
Effect: The target cannot be affected by the effect of your opponent's Jutsu cards during this turn.
"There isn't anything else to hold on to. I need to check our surroundings, so in the meantime just endure it."

name: Rapid Communication
effect:
Permanent (3)
Effect: When your opponent's Tracked Ninja is sent out to Block, draw 1 card.
"Our voices travel farther than wireless radios, and our noses that can instantly sniff out danger will protect you."

name: Reading Movement
effect:
Requirements: "Sharingan Eye"
Target: 1 Jutsu card being played
Effect: Change the effect of the target to the following:
The user gets -2/-2 during this turn and reveal your hand.
"We fought him earlier. He's fast… Stay alert!"

name: Relaxation
effect:
Permanent (2)
Effect: Jutsu cards cannot be played.
"Young lady, the dango here sure is wonderful!"

name: Revenge
effect:
Target: User
Effect: The target gets +X/+0 during this turn. X = number of Ninja cards in your Discard Pile. If the user is "Kakashi Hatake" double the value of X.
"How stubborn… You're still alive, huh?"

name: Rock Lee
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | GROWTH | SURGE
[EXPLOSIVE POWER]
This Ninja can be Surged by discarding any Ninja card from your hand with a "Taijutsu" Combat Attribute.
"Guy sensei, I did it! All your training has not been in vain!"

name: Sai
effect:
Leaf | Anbu | The Foundation | Male | Mental Power: 2
[INK SUMMONS]
During your Mission Phase, you can discard a card from your hand. In that case, put an "Animal" Ninja card from your Discard Pile in play with its effect text negated. At the end of the turn, if it still remains in play, remove it from the Game.
"This store's ink works really well for molding my Chakra."

name: Sakon
effect:
Sound | Male | The Four Sound Ninja | AMBUSH
[CURSED TWINS]
When this Ninja is sent out to Attack, if you have 1 or less cards in your hand, you can place 1 Growth coin on a Water Ninja with no Growth coins.
Cards in your Chakra area cannot be affected by the effects of your opponent's Ninja and Mission cards.

"-Are you coming?
-Or not?!"

name: Sakura Haruno
effect:
Leaf | Chunin | Female | Mental Power: 3 | Medical | SURGE
[IMPACT!!!]
Non-"Surge" Ninjas cannot be organized into Teams during the turn they are put in play.
This Ninja cannot be affected by the effects of your opponent's Ninja with an Entrance cost lower than this Ninja's Entrance cost.
"Cha!"

name: Sakura's Desire
effect:
Effect: Discard up to 2 Wind cards in your hand. If you discarded 1 card, draw 3 cards. If you discarded 2 cards, draw 4 cards.
While this Mission card is in your Chakra area, your "Sakura Haruno" gets +1 Entrance cost and +1 Mental Power.
"So? You think I've become a bit womanly?"

name: Sand Cocoon
effect:
Requirements: Entrance cost of 2 or more
Target: User
Effect: Move the target to its owner's hand. In that case, move a Ninja card with the same name as the target from your hand into the target's Team in any position. If the user was not "Gaara of the Desert", move that Ninja back to your hand at the end of the turn.
"Gaara's even using his "Ultimate Defense" sand in this fight."

name: Sasori (Puppet Mode)
effect:
Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Jonin | Male | Mental Power: 3 | Name: Sasori | Puppet | Puppet Master | MASTERY | REINFORCEMENT
[SCORPION OF THE RED SANDS]
When this Ninja is sent to Attack, each player moves 1 of their Ninjas to its owner's hand at the end of this turn.(excluding this Ninja)
Valid: When this Ninja is removed from play, draw 2 cards.
"Now…What will you do?"

name: Sasori's Feelings
effect:
Effect: Draw 1 card for each of your Ninjas with an Entrance cost of 4 or more.
If this card is discarded from your hand or Deck due to your opponent's effect, move it to your hand instead.
"My own puppet?"

name: Sasuke Uchiha
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | Sharingan Eye | GROWTH
[NEW FOUND ABILITY]
When this Ninja is sent out to Battle, you can move up to 2 cards from your Discard Pile to your Chakra area. In that case, discard 3 of your Chakra at the end of your turn.
"It's too late Naruto… It's already too late. I can't go back anymore."

name: Sasuke Uchiha
effect:
Sound | Rogue Ninja | Male | Sharingan Eye | Hebi | AMBUSH | GROWTH
[VENGEFUL SPIRIT]
When this Ninja's Team wins any Victory, you can injure 1 of your opponent's Stand-By Ninjas.
Valid: This Ninja is considered to have "Jonin".
"From this point on, we move together. And henceforth, we will call ourselves… Hebi."

name: Sasuke Uchiha (State 2)
effect:
Sound | Rogue Ninja | Male | Name: Sasuke Uchiha | Sharingan Eye | State 2 | Hebi | MASTERY | REINFORCEMENT
[POWER OF THE CURSE]
This Ninja card can only be put in play during your Mission Phase by moving your "Sasuke Uchiha" with an Entrance cost of 4 or more to your Chakra area while you have no cards in your hand. While you have no cards in your hand, your Water Ninjas cannot be affected by the effects of your opponent's cards.
Valid: This Ninja is considered to have "Jonin".
"You wanted it so badly that you went after the fledgling in the nest… But you became targeted as a prey instead…"

name: Scouting Party
effect: Effect: Teams with "Ninja Dog" Ninjas don't count towards the "3 Teams sent out to Attack" Restriction during this turn. Ninjas cannot receive any Damage due to the Showdown during this turn.
"These things here are different too, huh…"

name: Shelter from the Shifting Sands
effect:
Effect: Select 2 of your opponent's Battle Rewards. If any of them are face up, you can move 1 of them to your hand, then discard the rest.
Effect: While this Mission card is in your Chakra area, your opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.
"You're late, Sasori my man…I thought you didn't like to keep people waiting."

name: Shikamaru Nara
effect:
Leaf | Chunin | Male | Mental Power: 4 | GROWTH
[CHIVALROUS]
During your opponent's Mission Phase, you can turn 1 your opponent's Battle Rewards face down. In that case, select 1 of your opponent's Ninjas and negate its effect text during this turn.
"A real man doesn't let a woman do his fighting for him."

name: Shikamaru's Judgement
effect:
Requirements: "Leaf" + "Chunin" or higher Rank
Effect: Select 1 of the following and apply it:
(1) Negate 1 Jutsu card being played and move it to the top of its owner's Deck.
(2) Remove 1 in-play Mission card from the game.
If the user is "Shikamaru Nara", this Jutsu card cannot be affected by your opponent's effects.
"When you curse someone, you dig two holes."

name: Shinobi of the Sand
effect:
Permanent
Effect: When 1 of your Ninjas is Surged, apply any of the following effects according to the number of your "Surge" Ninjas.
1+) Your cards discarded for "Surge" are moved to the Chakra area instead. 3+) Your "Surge" Ninjas get +1 Entrance cost during this turn.
5+) Draw 1 card.
"Allies of the Leaf Village… "Were Shinobi…" "Of the Sand…"

name: Silent Prayer
effect:
Permanent
Effect: All Counter Mission cards get +1 Hand cost.
"Asuma…."

name: Snake Bind
effect:
Target: Every Ninja in the user's Team
Effect: The target becomes a Stand-By Ninja. If the user has a Water Symbol, place 1 Growth coin on the target.
"Stop it, both of you!"

name: Snake Transformation Jutsu
effect:
Target: User
Effect: If the target would be removed from play due to the Showdown or by the effects of your opponent's cards during this turn, heal it and place a Growth coin on it instead.
"Now, Sasuke… Give me your body!"

name: Spread Talons
effect:
Permanent (3)
Effect: At the start of your opponent's turn, if you have no cards in your hand, you can discard 1 of your opponent's Chakra. In that case, move 1 card from your Discard Pile to your Chakra area.
"By the eyes of a hawk soaring high above the sky."

name: Student and Sensei
effect: Effect: Your opponent gets 1 Battle Reward. In that case, draw 2 cards.
"The Will of Fire shines upon the village."

name: Suigetsu Hozuki
effect:
Sound | Rogue Ninja | Male | Hebi | AMBUSH
[SWORDSMAN]
At the start of your turn, if you have no cards in your hand, draw 1 card.
Valid: While you have no cards in your hand, Teams cannot perform a Mental Power Battle.
"Free at last. Thank you, Sasuke."

name: Summoning Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Oil" Combat Attribute
Effect: Search your Deck for 1 "Ninja Toad" Ninja card, reveal it, and move it into the user's Team in any position. Then, Shuffle your Deck. At the end of the turn, if the user did not have an Entrance cost of 4 or more, move that "Ninja Toad" Ninja to your hand.
"Whoa, that is totally awesome! .. That may be the coolest thing I've ever seen!"

name: Summoning Jutsu: Projectile Weapons
effect:
Requirements: "Weapon" Combat Attribute or "Leaf"
Target: 1 of your opponent's Ninjas
Effect: The target is Tracked. (Only 1 Ninja can be Tracked per player.) Negate the target's effect text during this turn.
"Haaa!"

name: Surprise Help
effect:
Permanent (2)
Effect: During your Mission Phase, you can discard the top 4 cards of your Deck. In that case, put 1 "Ninja Dog" Ninja card from your Discard Pile with an Entrance cost less than or equal to your Turn Marker in play.

"It's very rare for you to summon me."
"Pakkun is out on a mission, so Biscut, I need you to find naruto right away."

name: Sword Charge
effect:
Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: The target's Power becomes equal to its printed Power during this turn. Then, discard up to 2 of your opponent's Chakra or move up to 2 cards from your Discard Pile to your Chakra area.
"One down."

name: Sync Dance
effect: Effect: Search your Deck for an "Animal" Ninja card, reveal it, and move it to your hand. Then, shuffle your Deck.
"First comes special rhythm training!"

name: Take Down
effect:
Requirements: "Animal"
Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Injure the target. If you have 4 or more "Ninja Dogs" Ninjas, the target becomes a Stand-By Ninja.
"Aim for the legs! Immobilize Akamaru!"

name: Tayuya
effect:
Sound | Female | The Four Sound Ninja | AMBUSH
[CURSED FLUTE]
During the Mission Phase, if you have 2 or less cards in your hand, you can discard 2 of your Chakra. In that case, negate and discard 1 Mission card being played.
"Come with us!"

name: Team Asuma
effect:
Permanent (3)
Effect: When your opponent wins or gets any Battle Rewards, draw 1 card.

name: Temari
effect:
Sand | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 1 | SURGE
[CYCLONE]
When this Ninja is deployed or is Surged, you can move 1 "Surge" Ninja card from your Chakra area to its owner's hand.
"Excuse me did I ask for your opinion?!"

name: Temari & Gaara of the Desert
effect:
Sand | Jonin | Satoosa | Female | Male | Mental Power: 3 | MASTERY | SQUAD
[DUST TORNADO]
When this Ninja is put in play, your opponent discards their hand. In that case, they draw cards equal to the the number they discarded minus one.
Valid: Your opponent's non-"Surge" Ninjas get -2 Entrance cost.
"The cardinal rule of the desert. If you hit a sandstorm stay put." "Sand Prison!"

name: The First Hokage
effect:
Leaf | Satoosa | Male | Mental Power: 2 | MASTERY
[THE CREATOR]
When this Ninja is deployed, your opponent skips their next Mission Phase.
Valid: Your opponent's Mission and Client cards get +X Entrance cost. X = the number of your opponent's face-up Battle Rewards.

name: The Fourth Hokage
effect:
Leaf | Jonin | Male Mental Power: 2
[SAGE'S STUDENT]
Valid: Play with the top card of your Deck revealed. Your "Ninja Toad" Ninjas get the revealed card's Symbol(s).
"Everyone, please direct these kunai knives toward the enemy all at once. I will do the rest."

name: Tobi
effect:
Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Male | AMBUSH
[LEFT BEHIND]
Valid: "Akatsuki" Ninja cards in your hand and Chakra area get -1 Hand cost.
During your Mission Phase, you can move this Ninja to the bottom of your Deck. In that case, deploy an additional "Akatsuki" Ninja card from your hand during this turn without paying its hand cost.
"W-W-Wait, D-Deidara Sensei!"

name: Transference Ritual
effect:
Target: 1 Ninja
Effect: The user gets the target's effect text during this turn. Then, Negate the target's effect text and it gets -2/-2 during this turn.
"My future lies in this child!"

name: Unkai Kurama
effect:
Leaf | Male | Mental Power: 2 | Kurama Clan | SURGE
[REALITY OR ILLUSION]
Your other Ninjas with a "Genjutsu" Combat Attribute cannot be affected by the effect of your opponent's Ninjas.
Valid: When this Ninja is discarded due to the Showdown, draw 2 cards.
"If you seal off your five senses the Genjutsu will no longer have any effect on you."

name: Urushi
effect:
Leaf | Animal | Ninja Dog
[FERAL TRACKER]
Tracking (When this Ninja is put in play. Select a Ninja name.Your opponent's Ninjas that include that name are considered Tracked. Only 1 Ninja name per player can be Tracked at a time.)
While your opponent has a Tracked Ninja, this Ninja gets +2/+0.
"In peace and harmony… Hehehehe!"

name: Veterinary Meds
effect:
Target: 1 of your "Animal" Ninjas
Effect: Heal the target and it gets +2/+2 during this turn.
"Thanks…Akamaru…

name: Well Fed
effect:
Permanent
Effect: During your Mission Phase, you can move the top card of your Deck to your Chakra area.
Effect: During the Exchange of Jutsu, you can move any number of cards from your hand to your Chakra area.
"If we get food this awesome every mission, Captain Yamato can stay with us forever!"

name: Wind Style: Rasen Shuriken
effect:
Requirements: Naruto Uzumaki + Entrance cost of 3 or more
Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user.
Effect: Flip a coin twice. If you got any heads, draw 1 card and injure the user. If you got any tails, injure the target.
"That was an extraordinary amount of attacks. I couldn't even count them all with the Sharingan. What a Jutsu…"

name: Wind Style: Toad Water Pistol
effect:
Requirements: "Ninja Toad"
Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: The target becomes a Stand-By Ninja.
Combination (Wind):
"Now! Wind Style: Toad Water Pistol!"

name: Wood Style: Tree Bind Eternal Burial
effect:
Requirements: "Tree" Combat Attribute
Target: Every Ninja in 1 of your opponent's Teams
Effect: Negate the target's effect text during this turn. Then, the target becomes a Stand-By Ninja and cannot be sent out to Battle during the next turn. If the user is "The First Hokage", injure the target.
"ROAR!!!"

name: Yamato
effect:
Leaf | Male | Mental Power: 2 | AMBUSH
[SEEDS OF STRENGTH]
When this Ninja is deployed, you can play a face-up Mission card from your opponent's Battle Reward area (ignoring its Hand cost).
Valid:During your Mission Phase, you can turn 1 Battle Rewards face up or face down.
"Sorry, but from here on out…I'm playing for keeps!"

name: Zetsu
effect:
Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Jonin | Male | AMBUSH
[MYSTERIOUS NATURE]
Tracking
While this Ninja card is face-up in your opponent's Battle Reward area, you can deploy it.
Valid: The effect text of your opponent's Tracked Ninja is negated.
"When you're sad and alone, you can only trust in yourself."
